job.title: Sr. AWS Data Engineer/ Developer
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Staffing and Recruiting,Financial Services
job.description: <strong>AWS Date Engineer/Developer<br>Contract to hire<br>Irving, TX (remote position)<br><br><strong><u>Responsibilities<br><br></u></strong>Design and support the new and evolving sources of data being brought into the data warehouse.<br><br><strong><u>Requiremetns<br><br></u></strong>At least 9 years experience. Need Senior level candidate who can spearhead AWS effort. AWS is new to company.<br><strong>Experience working with AWS Analytical Component - Redshift.<br>Experience working with AWS GLUE - Managed ETL Service.<br>Experience optimizing data retrieval processes supporting API output and reading API calls.<br>Experience with performance tuning.<br><br><strong><u>Education Qualification<br><br></u></strong>Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science, Information Technology (IT), or closely related field.</strong></strong>
